title: Roger Williams National Memorial: Management
body: Management          Â    Roger Williams National Memorial was created by Congress October 22, 1965 to commemorate Roger Williams and his outstanding contributions to the development of the principals of freedom in this country, as well as to discuss what those freedoms mean in modern America.   Our Staff and Offices Find out who you will meet when you visit the Memorial.   Partners We work very closely with a number of partners to tell Roger Williams' story.   Law and Policies To learn about the regulations of the Memorial, or information of how it came to be established.
